testcase.name: We will Test if Send button is disabled when screen loads
We will Test if Send button is disabled when Title is Blank
We will Test if Send button is disabled when Body is Blank
We will Test if Send button is disabled when Confirmation field is Blank
We will Test if Send button is enabled when Confirmation field is filled
We will Test if Toast message appears when Notification sent
